doc:
Herbert Rawlinson https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Herbert_Rawlinson 0 Herbert Banemann Rawlinson (15 November 1885 – 12 July 1953) was an English-born stage, film, radio, and television actor. A leading man during Hollywood's silent film era, Rawlinson transitioned to character roles after the advent of sound films. Herbert_Banemann_Rawlinson ( 15_November_1885 – 12_July_1953 ) was an_English-born_stage , film , radio , and television_actor . A_leading_man during Hollywood 's_silent_film_era , Rawlinson transitioned to character_roles after the_advent of sound_films .
